titleStmt.title: Iosua Siluester Anagr: Uerè Os Salustij.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: Iosua Siluester Anagr: Uerè Os Salustij.

monogr.title: Du Bartas his deuine weekes and workes translated: and dedicated to the Kings most excellent Maiestie by Iosuah Syluester
monogr.author: Du Bartas, Guillaume de Salluste, seigneur
monogr.extent: 32, 697, 6, 698-819, 47, 87, 9 pages, 1 leaf of plates, illustrations, portraits (woodcuts), 4°

div.head: Iosua Siluester Anagr: Uerè Os Salustij.

lg.l: OStu SYLVESTER nostro cur Ore vocaris?
An quòd in ORE fer as Mel? quòd in Aure Mel-os?
An quòd BARTASSI faciem dum pingis et ORA,
ORA tui pariter quaelibet ora colit?
Nempe licèt duram praete fers nomine SILVAM,
Silvas et salebr as carmina nulla tenent:
Sed quod Athenarum COR, dux Salaminius olim
Dixit, Inest libris Os{que} vigor{que} tuis.
Ergo OS esto alijs, mihi Suadae LINGVA videris;
Musis et Phoebo charus OCELLVS eris.
